thread.title: Katie Piper takes daughter Belle to Eric Cowell's lavish third birthday party: see picture
thread.title_full: Katie Piper takes daughter Belle to Eric Cowell's lavish third birthday party: see picture

title: Katie Piper takes daughter Belle to Eric Cowell's lavish third birthday party: see picture
text:
Katie Piper takes daughter Belle to Eric Cowell's lavish third birthday party: see picture February 20, 2017 by Sharnaz Shahid Katie Piper gave fans a sneak peek into Simon Cowell's lavish dinosaur-themed party, which was thrown for his son Eric's third birthday on Sunday Leave a comment 
Katie Piper has given her followers a sneak peek into Eric Cowell 's dinosaur-themed birthday party, which was thrown by his father Simon Cowell over the weekend. The 33-year-old presenter took to her Instagram page to share a picture of her two-year-old daughter Belle enjoying the lavish celebrations. "Surprise guest at Eric's birthday - First time Belle has seen a real dinosaur," Katie wrote in the caption. 
Eric's birthday - which was on February 14 - was no doubt an impressive affair. Last year Simon and his girlfriend Lauren Silverman hosted their son's second birthday at the prestigious, members-only Arts Club in central London. Meanwhile, Katie has previously talked about her daughter's friendship with little Eric. "Our children were born a month apart, so it's quite sweet," she told Closer Magazine in 2015. "I've met Simon's girlfriend, Lauren, and Eric a few times â€“ and Eric and Belle have had a play date. They were quite young, so they lay there gurgling together. When she's older, I'll have to tell her she went on a 'date' with him!" A post shared by Katie Piper (@katiepiper_) on Feb 19, 2017 at 2:08pm PST 
STORY: Simon opens up about his son Eric 
Katie and the X Factor judge formed an unlikely friendship seven years ago, when Simon became patron of her charity, The Katie Piper Foundation. The television star, who is happily married to carpenter James Sutton, was a victim of a horrific acid attack in 2008. Over the past few weeks, Katie has been promoting her fifth book, Confidence: The Secret , and has urged fans to stay "positive" whenever they are feeling down or are having a bad day.
